languages.text: {n}Под стоны навигаторов Арлекин зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n} "Эта пьеса порядком затянулась — пришло время сыграть финальную сцену, мон-кай. Мы слишком долго искали сей мир и осколок в груди трехокой — первый из оскверненных. И мы вернем мир душам наших предков".

traits.locale_text: {n}Под стоны Навигаторов Арлекин зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n} "Эта пьеса порядком затянулас — пришло время сыграть финальную сцену, мон-кай. Мы слишком долго искали сей мир и осколок в груди трехокой — первый из оскверненных. И мы вернем мир душам наших предков".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Surrounded by the Navigators' groans, the Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "This play has dragged on long enough. It is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. For too long have we searched for this world and the shard within the three-eyed one's chest, the first of the tainted shards. And we will give this world back to the souls of our ancestors."
languages.original_text: {n}Под стоны навигаторов Арлекин зажимает кнопку на странном устройстве в руках.{/n} "Эта пьеса порядком затянулась — пришло время сыграть финальную сцену, мон-кай. languages.text: {n}航宙士たちがあげた不満の声に取り囲まれた状態で、ハーレクィンは手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンをぐっと押し続ける。{/n}「この劇はすっかり長引いてしまったね。終いの時間だ、モン＝ケイ。この星と三つ目のモン＝ケイの胸にあるかけら、一番汚れたかけらを調べるのに時間をかけすぎだ。じゃあ、僕はこの星に父祖の魂を戻すよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by the Navigators' groans, the Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "This play has dragged on long enough. It is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. For too long have we searched for this world and the shard within the three-eyed one's chest, the first of the tainted shards. And we will give this world back to the souls of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: {n}航宙士たちがあげた不満の声に取り囲まれた状態で、ハーレクィンは手にしていた見慣れぬ装置のボタンをぐっと押し続ける。{/n}「この劇はすっかり長引いてしまったね。終いの時間だ、モン＝ケイ。この星と三つ目のモン＝ケイの胸にあるかけら、一番汚れたかけらを調べるのに時間をかけすぎだ。じゃあ、僕はこの星に父祖の魂を戻すよ」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}丑角按住了手中古怪装置的按钮，周围的导航者呻吟起来。{/n}“这出戏已经拖得太久了，是时候落幕了，猴子。一直以来，我们都在寻找这个世界，寻找三眼之人胸口中的碎片，寻找第一块遭到玷污的碎片。如今，我们要将这个世界还给我们先祖的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by the Navigators' groans, the Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "This play has dragged on long enough. It is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. For too long have we searched for this world and the shard within the three-eyed one's chest, the first of the tainted shards. And we will give this world back to the souls of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角按住了手中古怪装置的按钮，周围的导航者呻吟起来。{/n}“这出戏已经拖得太久了，是时候落幕了，猴子。一直以来，我们都在寻找这个世界，寻找三眼之人胸口中的碎片，寻找第一块遭到玷污的碎片。如今，我们要将这个世界还给我们先祖的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Agacé par les protestations des navigateurs, l'Arlequin appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main.{/n} « Le spectacle a assez duré. L'heure du dénouement a sonné, mon-keigh. Voilà trop longtemps que je suis à la recherche de ce monde et du fragment incrusté dans la poitrine de la mon-keigh à trois yeux. Le premier des fragments corrompus. Il est temps de rendre à ce monde les âmes de nos ancêtres. »
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by the Navigators' groans, the Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "This play has dragged on long enough. It is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. For too long have we searched for this world and the shard within the three-eyed one's chest, the first of the tainted shards. And we will give this world back to the souls of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: {n}Agacé par les protestations des navigateurs, l'arlequin appuie sur un bouton de l'étrange appareil qu'il tient en main.{/n} « Le spectacle a assez duré. L'heure du dénouement a sonné, mon-keigh. Voilà trop longtemps que je suis à la recherche de ce monde et du fragment incrusté dans la poitrine de la mon-keigh à trois yeux. Le premier des fragments corrompus. Il est temps de rendre à ce monde les âmes de nos ancêtres. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}El Arlequín, rodeado por los gemidos de los Navegantes, aprieta un botón del extraño dispositivo en su mano y lo mantiene presionado.{/n} «Esta obra ya ha durado lo suficiente. Es hora de la última escena, mon-keigh. Durante demasiado tiempo hemos buscado este mundo y el fragmento contenido en el pecho de la mon-keigh de tres ojos, el primero de los fragmentos mancillados. Devolveremos este mundo a las almas de nuestros ancestros».
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by the Navigators' groans, the Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "This play has dragged on long enough. It is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. For too long have we searched for this world and the shard within the three-eyed one's chest, the first of the tainted shards. And we will give this world back to the souls of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arlequín, rodeado por los gemidos de los Navegantes, aprieta un botón del extraño dispositivo en su mano y lo mantiene presionado.{/n} «Esta obra ya ha durado lo suficiente. Es hora de la última escena, mon-keigh. Durante demasiado tiempo hemos buscado este mundo y el fragmento contenido en el pecho de la mon-keigh de tres ojos, el primero de los fragmentos mancillados. Devolveremos este mundo a las almas de nuestros ancestros».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Begleitet vom Stöhnen der Navigatoren drückt und hält der Harlekin eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand.{/n} "Dieses Stück zieht sich schon zu lange hin. Es wird Zeit für die letzte Szene, Chem-Pan-Sey. Wir haben zu lange nach dieser Welt und dem Splitter in der Brust des Dreiauges gesucht, dem ersten der durch den Makel entweihten Splitter. Und wir werden diese Welt den Seelen unserer Ahnen zurückgeben."
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by the Navigators' groans, the Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "This play has dragged on long enough. It is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. For too long have we searched for this world and the shard within the three-eyed one's chest, the first of the tainted shards. And we will give this world back to the souls of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: {n}Begleitet vom Stöhnen der Navigatoren drückt und hält der Harlekin eine Taste auf dem merkwürdigen Gerät in seiner Hand.{/n} "Dieses Stück zieht sich schon zu lange hin. Es wird Zeit für die letzte Szene, Chem-Pan-Sey. Wir haben zu lange nach dieser Welt und dem Splitter in der Brust des Dreiauges gesucht, dem ersten der durch den Makel entweihten Splitter. Und wir werden diese Welt den Seelen unserer Ahnen zurückgeben."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: {n}Rotacıların iniltilerinin arasında Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp ardından basılı tutuyor.{/n} "Bu piyes yeterince uzadı. Artık son perdedeyiz mon-keigh. Kaç zamandır bu dünyanın ve o üç gözlünün göğsündeki parçanın peşindeyiz. O parça, lekelenmiş parçaların ilki. Atalarımızın ruhlarını bu dünyaya geri kazandıracağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Surrounded by the Navigators' groans, the Harlequin presses and holds a button on the strange device in his hands.{/n} "This play has dragged on long enough. It is time for the closing scene, mon-keigh. For too long have we searched for this world and the shard within the three-eyed one's chest, the first of the tainted shards. And we will give this world back to the souls of our ancestors."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rotacıların iniltilerinin arasında Arleken, elindeki tuhaf cihazın üzerindeki bir düğmeye basıp basılı tutuyor.{/n} "Bu piyes yeterince uzadı. Artık son perdeye geldik mon-keigh. Kaç zamandır bu dünyanın ve o üç gözlünün göğsündeki parçanın peşindeyiz. O parça, lekelenmiş parçalardan ilki. Atalarımızın ruhlarını bu dünyaya geri kazandıracağız."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
